name: School Queen Bee
description:
Hey beautiful Queen , it's prom night time !
Be Like a Queen Bee or Die Trying
The baddie is choosing the most beautiful outfits for the catwalk! You can choosing skin, dress, shoe, bag as per like.

Your goal is to rock the catwalk like a queen bee and impress your prince. Choose your best outfit, shoe, hair style and bag pieces for the runway in order to beat your opponent! And also you can collect more and more diamond.

If you want to walk like a QUEEN bee, always choose the most chic attire! The better the outfit, shoe, bag. The higher the scores—you'll be chic and unbeatable!
